mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1370) for an order placed by Ray Lambrecht for 200 two color jumbos for a performance by Kitty Wells and Grandpa Jones at the Memorial Auditorium in Sterling, Colorado on June 15. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
